sentences.en: A mouse ran out from the dark orifice of the cave.
sentences.cn: 一只老鼠从黑暗的洞口跑出.

sentences.en: After a massive heart attack, he was strapped to a bed, with tubes in every orifice.
sentences.cn: 经历了一次严重的心脏病发作之后，他被绑在床上，全身都插着导管。

sentences.en: An endless flow of words streamed from the same orifice.
sentences.cn: 一连串滔滔不绝的话都是同一张嘴巴讲出来的.

sentences.en: As previously mentioned , spacing of the orifice groups with relationship to each other is important.
sentences.cn: 如前所述,喷孔组合的相互间距是重要的.

sentences.en: It has rounded shoulders inside instead of the sharp orifice - like edge.
sentences.cn: 在内部作成圆形凸肩以代替锐缘孔板 状 的侧面.

sentences.en: Orifice's pressure losses are attributed to entrainment and eddy formation.
sentences.cn: 孔板的压力被认为是由卷吸和涡流造成的.

sentences.en: The attachment region may surround an orifice in the fluid ejector substrate.
sentences.cn: 该附着区域可以围绕该流体喷射器衬底中的孔.

sentences.en: The beltless machine, sometimes called a " fixed " orifice pasting machine.
sentences.cn: 无带式涂片机, 有时称为 “ 定位 ” 出口涂片机.

sentences.en: The concentric orifice is most frequently used type.
sentences.cn: 同心圆孔板是最经常使用的形式.

sentences.en: The density P is that of the fluid escaping from the orifice.
sentences.cn: 上式中P是从小孔喷出的流体密度.

sentences.en: The distance between orifice groups is another parameter associated with stability.
sentences.cn: 喷孔组合之间的距离是与不稳定性有关的另一参数.

sentences.en: The tumor may prolapse through the orifice.
The valve shown has a pilot and a bleed orifice.
sentences.cn: 该阀具有控制孔和流出孔.

sentences.en: There are people whose every orifice is occupied by a whirring machine.
sentences.cn: 有的人,身上每个孔都插着嗡嗡叫的机器管.

sentences.en: Vee Orifice option is shown on drawing with phantom lines.
sentences.cn: 形流道选项在图中用虚线显示.

phrases.tran_cn: 孔板；挡板；节磷板；量孔板

trans.tran_en: one of the holes in your body, such as your mouth, nose etc
